imdb.title: Jûbê ninpûchô: Ryûhôgyoku-hen
imdb.plot: Fourteen years after defeating the immortal warrior Himuro Genma and thwarting the Shogun of the Dark's evil plans, Kibagami Jubei continues to roam all over Japan as a masterless swordsman. During his journey, he meets Shigure, a...

episodes.title: Kakure sato muzan
episodes.plot: Roga from the Hiruko Clan has stolen the rare and powerful Dragon Stone.

episodes.title: Tabidachi
episodes.plot: Jubei tries to find a way to get the rare Dragon Stone to Shigure, however he is being hunted by two evil rival clans.

episodes.title: Jaren dôkoku
episodes.plot: Jyashi and Rengoku attack Dakuan and Jubei to get the Dragon Stone.

episodes.title: Wareta hôgyoku
episodes.plot: The Dragon Stone gets split in two pieces and one of the half's gets sent to the Kimon Shu base.

episodes.title: Kongô dôji
episodes.plot: Tsubute steals the Dragon Stone from Shigure and then meets Tatsunosuke, a thief who also wants it.

episodes.title: Amayodori
episodes.plot: Jubei gets attacked and poisoned. He meets a boy and his mother and cure him. But he finds out that the monster that poisoned him can take different bodies.

episodes.title: Tsubomi
episodes.plot: Jubei's half of the stone gets stolen yet again by the Root Woman but a Kimon Shu member attacks her.

episodes.title: Rengoku shôten
episodes.plot: Rengoku will do whatever it takes to kill Jubei to avenge her brother's death.

episodes.title: Harawata ni ryû
episodes.plot: Shigure gets saved by a man named Zofu who is from the Yagyu Clan. He tells her the secrets of the Hiruko Clan to her and also wants to kill an old friend. He might get that change with the help from Jubei.

episodes.title: Hiruko no magokoro
episodes.plot: Shigure has a unlikely friend by her side named Rokai who is a Hiruko Ninja. Shigure gets captured by the Kimon Shu and Rokai is unable to protect her.

episodes.title: Yagyû Ren'ya
episodes.plot: Jubei has to save Shigure, so he takes a ship to a different area of Japan. While traveling, he meets Yagyu Reyna, a samurai who is cold blooded and wants the Dragon Stone and also, Shigure. But there is also a killer on the ship as well.

episodes.title: Ôchô fukkatsu
episodes.plot: Jubei's commitment to save Shigure pays off when he, Dakuan, and Tsubute execute a successful rescue mission. But something is wrong, and Shigure is acting strangely. The outcome of war may depend on Jubei finding out why.

episodes.title: Seiten hyôhyô
episodes.plot: Shigure's destiny is unveiled and she now has to walk the path of the Priestess of Light. Can she do it without Jubei?
